definitions.definition: The branch of mathematics dealing with spatial relationships.
A mathematical system that deals with spatial relationships and that is built on a particular set of axioms ; a subbranch of geometry which deals with such a system or systems.
definitions.label_groups: mathematics , often qualified in combination , countable

definitions.definition: The observed or specified spatial attributes of an object, etc.
A mathematical object comprising representations of a space and of its spatial relationships.

main_definition: ( mathematics , uncountable ) The branch of mathematics dealing with spatial relationships.
secondary_definitions: ( mathematics , often qualified in combination , countable ) A mathematical system that deals with spatial relationships and that is built on a particular set of axioms ; a subbranch of geometry which deals with such a system or systems.
( countable ) The observed or specified spatial attributes of an object, etc.
( algebraic geometry , countable ) A mathematical object comprising representations of a space and of its spatial relationships.
